alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:38PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Sherburne, Wright and Stearns Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM CDT Wednesday, the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 9.8 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 03/30/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
